post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Please send your resume if you meet all requirements ASAP! Thanks!
The position below is currently available through Procom. If you meet the qualifications and are interested in this opportunity please apply as per the instructions below. Please note, this automated email has been sent to you as the result of a successful keyword search on your resume within our database. Please use discretion by only applying to positions that best suit your qualifications. If you wish to remove yourself from future mailings, please click the link supplied below.
Position: Intermediate Java Developer
Our client is a Software Development company and a leader in their niche industry; in Waterloo.
They are creating a new development team and need to start with two intermediate Java Developers.
In this role you will be responsible for analysis and coding of business/enterprise applications.
Mandatory Skills: Java server side development (4+ years); Servlets, SOAP, Tomcat, Oracle; XML (3+ years)
Nice-to-Have Skills: SQL
Location: Waterloo
Duration: Permanent
Rate/Salary: Competitive base salary, benefits and options
Start Date: Immediate
KathrynC@procom.ca
post.title: CORE Java Developer
